k c u color you choose as your mc1 and your row 4 k1 p1 brk p1 to last st k1 r t mc2 it s recommended to knit two swatches s n o and swap mc1 and mc2 for the second note for two color stripes change colors o m @ swatch the results will differ quite dramati- after row 2 & 4 o fn cally and swatching it both ways will enable i 3 you to see which outcome you prefer 2 0 2 y b n r o h photography daan schipper a js a final editing karen fought and irina phillips ta n title quote eurythmics © e jp le h c s 4 techniques tuck stitch knitting similar to brioche knitting tuck stitches are created using slipped stitches while carrying the yarn over the stitch the stitch with its yarn over is considered one stitch the yarn over is never counted separately try to see this stitch as a stitch with a shawl around its shoulders
